Description: The SELECT command retrieves data from a database.
The INSERT command adds new records to a table.
Syntax: INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2) VALUES (value1, value2);

Description: The UPDATE command is used to modify existing records in a table.
Syntax: UPDATE table_name SET column1 = value1, column2 = value2 WHERE condition;
Example: UPDATE employees SET employee_name = 'John Doe', department = 'Marketing';

Description: The DELETE command removes records from a table.
Example: DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
